description:
As her ghouls rush to unseal Asura, Medusa stands in the way of Dr. Stein and his students. Elsewhere, Maka decides to settle it once and for all with Crona.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Début de la bataille souterraine. En avant ! Les Vecto-Flèches de Médusa ?
Inizia la battaglia sotterranea. Superiamo il Vector Arrow di Medusa?
Kaishi, Chika Koubousen: Toppa Seyo, Medusa no Vector Arrow?
The Underground Battle Commences: Break Through Medusa`s Vector Arrow?
開始, 地下攻防戦 ~突破せよ, メデューサのベクトルアロー?~
